content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'lake_vyadls_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [lake_vyadls_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION   = 'https://vyadls.dfs.core.windows.net/lake', 
	)
Go

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE holiday (
	[date] date,
	[localName] varchar(8000),
	[name] varchar(8000),
	[countryCode] varchar(8000),
	[fixed] bit,
	[global] bit,
	[launchYear] varchar(8000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'holiday/part-00000-8fa33c2c-5408-4ba9-9ddf-de4c6ce11bf9-c000.snappy.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [lake_vyadls_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM holiday
GO
